---
title: "Comparison"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(ToxicR)
library(drc)
library(drcHelper)
library(bmd)
```


```{r}
m1 <- drm(rootl ~ conc, data = ryegrass, fct = LL.3())
m1 <- drm(rootl ~ conc, data = ryegrass, fct = LL.4())
drcHelper::ED.plus(m1,c(10,50),CI="delta",trend="Decrease",level=0.90)
drcHelper::ED.plus(m1,c(10,50),CI="inv",trend="Decrease",level=0.90)
ED(m1,c(10,50),interval="inv",level=0.9)
ED(m1,c(10,50),interval="delta",level=0.9,type="relative")
ED(m1,c(10,50),interval="delta",level=0.9,type="absolute")
```


```{r}
rootl <- ryegrass$rootl
conc <- ryegrass$conc
fit1 <- single_continuous_fit(conc,rootl,fit_type = "mle",model_type = "hill",BMD_TYPE="rel",BMR=0.1,alpha=0.025)
summary(fit1)
```
